ProductInfo.Features:
Construction: Aluminum. 20 infrared LEDs for night vision
1/3'' Color CCD image sensor; NTSC format; 480 TV lines
Mini illumination 0 lux; 3.6mm Lens; Auto white balance; Auto Gain Control
Weatherproof Aluminum Housing; Vandal armor design protects the camera
Package included: 1 of IR camera, 1 of 12V DC 500mA power supply, 1 of extension cable and 1 of security warning Decal
